items.text:
The Silverfin flows cheerily beneath the great bridge, which was
coaxed from the very earth and shaped by the Stoneweavers in a
display of great discipline. The shapers from the Monastery spent
several years to manifest this marvel and only finished the work last
spring. Since then, you can’t walk twenty paces in Spire without
overhearing someone talking about how wonderfully useful it is.
